description:
LATEST: Course Updated for January 2016

Join THOUSANDS of Delighted Students worldwide that follow this Amazing Practical course LIVE and now available to you to follow ONLINE!

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Would you like a FREE proven ways to grow your business instantly and make more money and endless referrals?

Do you ever wish you had the opportunity to get new clients from any connection you establish with another person?

Do you want to learn the secrets that master networkers use to attract, influence and deeply connect with business connections?

Do you want to gain instant confidence so you can connect with anyone, anywhere, anytime?

Do you want to learn one of the most powerful marketing methods for your business that is available for FREE for you?

You definitely chose the right course!

I'm going to help you increase & improve your connections with other people and grow instantly your business. This is a completely new way to think about how you interact with people and the impact you have on those around you.

And you can learn this method of 'Attentional Networking' in basic steps in this course.

Whether you are in the business world, looking for a job or the social scene you have to master the way you connect with others in the world.

My goal is to make you more memorable, connected and influential with a charm and get repeat business and endless referrals with NO money!

In this course you will learn how to become a master networker and connect authentically with every person to attract new prospects, influence and deeply connect and grow substantially your business. This course will teach you the power of networking and make sure you understand that networking is not selling. You will learn to develop your personal brand, so other people will know about you and refer business to you on a constant basis.

I kept this course concise, compact and actionable because you're busy and you want change NOW! I got you.

What others are saying about the course:

"Itzik's course is a must for every entrepreneur. Itzik teaches you in easy ways how to make a real difference in your connections with other people to build a real network for the long run that brings you constantly new and more clients. The course is full of actionable ideas that can be directly implemented. If you would like to grow your business, you must take this course, from the #1 authority on Networking globally" – R. Gandhi, CEO [India]

"Itzik's presentation left me and the rest of our staff in WOW, and filled us with excitement. Itzik has a rare ability to engage with the audience and enlighten them to ways of thinking and communicating with the world that they may have never contemplated before. His innate charisma and seamlessly integrated multimedia presentation immediately captured the audience's attention and did not let it go until every audience member was convinced of Itzik's thesis. Itzik truly gives a very practical master class in how networking should be done. Do not miss the opportunity to listen to Itzik"—F. Veisman, Partner [Brazil]

“I have had the pleasure of listening to Itzik speak at several live conferences over the last five years. I am always amazed at how his energetic and informal style draws in his audience, prompts participation, and makes people think about complex concepts in meaningful and simple ways. He has a unique sense of humor, which appeals to a wide audience. He presents his considerable expertise, particularly in the realm of networking, marketing and personal branding, in a way that is simply unforgettable. I highly recommend his trainings to anyone seeking to expand their business and get seas of referrals"—H. Irvine, Chairman [South Africa]

Would you like a FREE marketing way that works and deliver you prospects and clients on a constant basis?

Can you fully study this entire course and do exactly as it shows?

Build your own business – attract new clients, influence, deeply connect with them and get the success you always wanted in a short term - Networking does EVERYTHING for you.

Millions of people, people just like you from all over the world, use the secrets of networking to grow astonishingly and constantly their business on a daily basis.

Yes, this works all over the world, no matter where you live!

I show how you can turn your contacts into real paying clients- and how to do this on a daily basis for FREE.

This Networking course - just for you! It's a perfect way to learn to use your natural skills & improve them to grow your business and get new clients.

This course gives you the exact step-by-step plan to become a Master networker and create your own seas of referrals and raving fans.

You will learn the exact same strategies I use in my businesses to become very successful.

Did you know that 86% of people find new clients, or get a new job not by marketing or solicitation but by networking and learning to 'energize' their network? Amazing - but true!

What's in the course:

Through the use of video tutorials, presentations and real-world practical examples you will gain the tools needed to build powerful connections that you will be able to implement immediately! After the first 20 minutes of the course you will already have acquired the basic skills needed to make authentic connections and by the end of the course you will have mastered the art and the power of networking and connecting to grow your business instantly.

Why should you take this course:

You should take this course if:

  • You want to be attract new business without money and by networking;
  • You want to be connect with other people with authenticity;
  • You want to learn the mind set and the skills set of master networkers;
  • You want to know how to deeply connect with other people and earn more business constantly;
  • You want to be influential in different business situations;
  • You want to learn how to build fast impactful personal brand;
  • You want to master the art of power networking.

New to networking?

This course is great place to start and see results in the next 7 days!

Already using networking?

Just applying one of the several strategies in this course could easily 10X your results!

Just imagine if you got just one new client from the skills you learn from this course...

How much is a single client worth to you?

As a student of this course, you will even get my help!

I will add once in a period a free "Ask Me" sessions, where I answer your networking questions and all questions and answers are shown in the course.

The course reveals all the insider secrets, shows you many ways to make money, expand your business and get new prospects by networking. The more you practice it the better you will become and the more you will enjoy it! These methods I share in the course are methods I use myself in my daily life.

If you are entrepreneur - They can help you get many new prospects and clients; if you are an employee - they can get you a higher position; and if you are unemployed – it will get you a new job.

Just follow the simple insider secrets which I reveal. This easy to follow course continues to grow and grow with new ideas, new suppliers, new secrets. With my renowned help and support at all stages, you can become a real master networker!

And one very important point.

You have a totally unconditional guarantee. Study the course. Test the methods. If you are in any way unhappy (I can't imagine, why, but nevertheless!) you will get a full 100%, absolutely no conditions attached, no questions asked, refund direct from Udemy.

That's our personal assurance of your success!

As part of this Udemy course you get:

  • You get free lifetime access
  • Exclusive “Student Only" live Q & A sessions
  • All future extra lectures and upgrades are always free
  • Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee and that's my personal promise to your success!

Remember: You can achieve everything in life with the help of other people. So come and learn how do you connect powerfully with anyone, anytime, anywhere.

Click the "take this course" button, top right, NOWand I look forward to helping you become a Master Networker andgrow your business directly!

Let's connect.

For your Networking Success,

-- Itzik
title: Power Networker: Start Converting Contacts into Contracts
